title: Mrs. Deadpool and the Howling Commandos (2015) #1 ( BRADSHAW TEAM VARIANT)
description: - She is Shiklah-undisputed Queen of the Monster Metropolis below Manhattan! - In the world that was, she married Deadpool, the Merc with the Mouth... - ...But nothing on Battleworld is quite as it was. - Now, she commands the Howling Commandos: Werewolf By Night! Frankenstein's Monster! The Living Mummy! Man-Thing! And Marcus the Centaur! - What would her late husband think of that???

textObjects.text: - She is Shiklah-undisputed Queen of the Monster Metropolis below Manhattan! - In the world that was, she married Deadpool, the Merc with the Mouth... - ...But nothing on Battleworld is quite as it was. - Now, she commands the Howling Commandos: Werewolf By Night! Frankenstein's Monster! The Living Mummy! Man-Thing! And Marcus the Centaur! - What would her late husband think of that???
